name: GALACTIC VENTURES, LLC
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to DOD and commercial space provisions - no specific legislation.
Issues related to NASA and commercial space launch provisions including S. 3277 - Space Frontier Act of 2018 and H.R. 302 - FAA Reauthorization Act of 2018.
Issues related to DOD space-launch appropriations including unnumbered FY20 Defense Appropriations and unnumbered FY20 National Defense Authorization Act.
